short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is only for one who are using tatadocomo wifi in chrome browser to automatically log them in.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
step 1 : click extension
step 2: enter information
step 3 : connect to tatadocomo wifi 
step 4 : extension will automatically enter the information in existing user and logs you in !
NOTE : FOR TATADOCOMO WIFI USER
NOTE : WE WILL NOT COLLECT ANY INFORMATION
